item.title: Super Mario Bros. Movie Gets New 4K Steelbook Edition - Preorder Now
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/super-mario-bros-movie-4k-blu-ray-walmart-exclusive-preorder-march-2025/1100-6528298/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The Super Mario Bros. Movie is getting a new 4K Blu-ray release with a steelbook case on March 4, 2025. Exclusive to Walmart and available to preorder now for $28, The Super Mario Bros. Limited Edition Steelbook is likely to sell out fast. Walmart's exclusive steelbook releases of popular films often sell out well before launch, and we're talking about the biggest video game adaptation of all time here.

In a bizarre plot twist, Walmart has also restocked the original steelbook release. You can purchase the Power-Up Edition's Collectible Steelbook version for $28, too. This edition has largely been sold out since prior to launch last June, but sporadic, briefly available restocks have popped up at major retailers over the past year.

Super Mario Bros. Movie Steelbook Editions:

  • Original 2023 release with Super Mushroom Steelbook -- $28 | Restocked at Walmart, available now
  • New 2025 Walmart-exclusive with Question Block Steelbook -- $28 | Preorder at Walmart, releases March 4

The Mario Movie's original Steelbook Edition sold out before its release last June, and unlike some "limited" releases, it proved to actually be limited. If you weren't able to snag a copy then, or if you simply love Mario enough to buy another steelbook, now's your chance to get a bright yellow steelbook that screams, "It's-a Me, Mario."

The Super Mario Bros. Movie Walmart-Exclusive Steelbook Edition (4K)

$28 | Releases March 4

Walmart's new Steelbook Edition of The Super Mario Bros. Movie is modeled after the iconic Question Block from the games (and film). Instead of bopping it with your head to reveal its contents, you open it like any other case. The interior of the case features landscape artwork depicting the Mushroom Kingdom's many varieties of large mushrooms.

The steelbook case has slots for the 4K Blu-ray and 1080p Blu-ray discs of the film. Like the original release, you'll also get a digital copy of the film. The Mario Movie is available on Movies Anywhere, so you can add it to your library and watch on any of your devices.

The Super Mario Bros. Movie Power-Up Steelbook Edition (4K)

$28 | Restocked at Walmart on Dec. 6

We can't imagine the Power-Up Edition's Collectible Steelbook variant will be up for grabs for very long. But for now at least, you can have your pick of the two. Considering the price of some steelbook editions lately, the $28 price for both of these feels cheap. Heck, even if you bought both of them, your $56 total would be less than some other movies.

This one has a black case with a Super Mushroom on the front and back. The interior artwork is a landscape shot of the Mushroom Kingdom leading up to Princess Peach's Castle. It also comes with 4K Blu-ray, standard Blu-ray, and digital versions of the movie. The only differences between the two are the case and when your order will ship.

If you're looking to buy the movie as a Christmas gift, Walmart is shipping the Power-Up Edition's Collectible Steelbook now.

All editions of The Super Mario Bros. Movie contain the same special features. You can check those out below.

The Super Mario Bros. Movie Special Features

  • Leveling Up: Making The Super Mario Bros. Movie - Six-part featurette detailing the creation of the adaptation.
  • The Super Mario Bros. Movie Field Guide - Featurette introducing the Mushroom Kingdom and its inhabitants.
  • Getting to Know the Cast - The voice actors discuss their roles.
  • Leadership Lessons from Anya Taylor-Joy - Princess Peach's voice actor talks about being a leader..
  • Peaches Lyric Video - Jack Black, also known as Bowser, sings his smash hit ballad about Princess Peach.

The Super Mario Bros. Movie is also available for cheap on 4K Blu-ray without a steelbook case at Amazon and Walmart. The standard Blu-ray and DVD releases are steeply discounted right now, too:

Super Mario Bros. Movie without steelbook case:

  • Amazon
    • 4K Blu-ray -- $13
    • Blu-ray -- $10.50
    • DVD -- $8
  • Walmart
    • 4K Blu-ray -- $13
    • Blu-ray -- $10.50
    • DVD -- $8
  • The Minecraft Creeper Mini Fridge Is On Sale For Only $29 At Walmart
  • The Legend Of Zelda Metal Puzzles Restocked At Amazon - Still On Sale For Only $15
  • Demon Slayer Blu-Rays Steeply Discounted At Amazon - Swordsmith Village Arc Launched Today
  • + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (5)
  • Indiana Jones And The Great Circle Collector's Edition Up For Preorder At Amazon
  • Get Dark Souls Board Game For Only $51 And Roleplaying Sourcebook For $30
  • PS5 Pro Disc Drive Is Sold Out At Most Retailers, But Walmart Has It (For Now)
  • The PS5 Pro Is Available Now And Eligible For One-Day Delivery At Amazon
  • Zelda: Echoes Of Wisdom Is Already On Sale For 25% Off

item.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 PC Specs And Console Details Revealed, Including PS5 Pro Settings
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/kingdom-come-deliverance-2-pc-specs-and-console-details-revealed-including-ps5-pro-settings/1100-6528294/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Warhorse Studios has revealed Kingdom Come Deliverance 2's PC specs and console details. These include some specific settings for PS5 Pro, as well as what differences to expect between Xbox Series X and Series S.

For PC, Warhorse Studio has provided six different PC settings, ranging from low to ultra, as well as three different settings for Xbox Series X|S and PS5. The PC requirements are fairly modest, but the highest settings will demand fairly new and high-end GPUs. The Series S is limited to 30fps, but the Series X has 30fps and 60fps options. The PS5 Pro doesn't seem to offer any different options, rather just combining the target resolution and frame rate of the two options on the base PS5.

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 PC Specs

  • Average performance: 1080 @ 30fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Recommended 1080p (medium)

  • Average performance: 1080p @ 60fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K / AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Memory: 24GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 660 XT
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Recommended 1440p (medium)

  • Average performance: 1080p @ 60fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K / AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Memory: 24GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Recommended 1080p (high)

  • Average performance: 1080 @ 30fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 32GB Ram
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 Super / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Recommended 1440p (high)

  • Average performance: 1440 @ 60fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700K / AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 32GB Ram
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 / AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Best (ultra)

  • Average performance: 1440 @ 60fps / 2160p @ 30fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-13700K / AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 32GB Ram
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4080 / AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT
  • Storage: 100GB SSD
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 console details

Xbox Series S

  • Resolution: 1080p
  • Target performance: 30fps
  • Upscaling technology: N/A

Xbox Series X (performance)

  • Resolution: Upscaled 1440p
  • Target performance: 60fps (unlocked with VRR)
  • Upscaling technology: AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution

Xbox Series X (fidelity)

  • Resolution: Upscaled 2160p
  • Target performance: 30fps
  • Upscaling technology: AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution

PlayStation 5 (performance)

  • Resolution: Upscaled 1440p
  • Target performance: 60fps (unlocked with VRR)
  • Upscaling technology: AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution

PlayStation 5 fidelity (performance)

  • Resolution: Upscaled 2160p
  • Target performance: 30fps
  • Upscaling technology: AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution

PlayStation 5 Pro

  • Resolution: Upscaled 2160p
  • Target performance: 60fps (unlocked with VRR)
  • Upscaling technology: PlayStation Spectral Super Resolution

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 is a first-person action game taking place in a medieval setting, and is the follow-up to 2018's Kingdom Come Deliverance. It launches on February 4, 2025 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. It was supposed to launch on February 11, but was pushed up a week presumably to avoid the other big releases in February such as Assassin's Creed Shadows, Avowed, and Monster Hunter Wilds. The game will not include any DRM whatsoever.

George Yang on Google+

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
